Package sportstournament.gui

Class Screen

java.lang.Object
sportstournament.gui.Screen
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuyAthleteScreen, BuyItemScreen, ClubScreen, EndGameScreen, InventoryScreen, MainScreen, MarketScreen, StadiumScreen, TakeByeScreen, TeamPropertiesScreen
public abstract class Screen extends Object
This abstract class implements a Screen which contains generic attributes and methods that all screens inherit and implement
Author:
Isaac Steele and Reuben Schoonbee
